concept-wr.title: wrs-snmp-mibâ€”SNMP MIBs
concept-wr.shortdesc: This component documents the Wind River Enterprise SNMP Management Information Base (MIB) for system alarms management on a Titanium Server deployment.

conbody.p: Support for SNMP is implemented as follows:

li.p: Access is disabled by default and must be enabled manually from the command-line interface.
It is available using the controller node's floating OAM IP address, over the standard UDP port 161.
Access is read-only for all SNMP communities.
All SNMP communities have access to the entire OID tree. There is no support for VIEWS.
The supported SNMP operations are GET, GETNEXT, GETBULK, and SNMPv2c-TRAP2. The SNMP SET operation is not supported.
